metadata.title: CVE-2017-0691 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework. Product:Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36724453.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

digikam - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
digikam-data - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
digikam-private-libs - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
kipi-plugins - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
kipi-plugins-common - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
showfoto - 4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: digikam package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:5.6.0-0ubuntu10+esm1').
